CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard for Watermark meeting (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Watermark enabled Microsoft Teams meetings will now support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard to also be watermarked.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard for Watermark meeting (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Watermark enabled Microsoft Teams meetings will now support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard to also be watermarked.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Group chat profile picture
CurrentVersion.description: You will have a better way to reflect your team and group chat topic, with custom pictures. Group chat members can upload an image or use pre-selected illustrations and emojis, adding a layer of inclusivity and expression to their chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Group chat profile picture
OldVersion.description: You will have a better way to reflect your team and group chat topic, with custom pictures. Group chat members can upload an image or use pre-selected illustrations and emojis, adding a layer of inclusivity and expression to their chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: An improved search experience in chat and channels
CurrentVersion.description: A new search experience will allow users to search in a specific chat or channel and reach relevant results faster. The results will appear in the right handrail so you can stay in the flow of your work. Enhancements like highlighted key words will make it easier for user to scan their results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: An improved search experience in chat and channels
OldVersion.description: A new search experience will allow users to search in a specific chat or channel and reach relevant results faster. The results will appear in the right handrail so you can stay in the flow of your work. Enhancements like highlighted key words will make it easier for user to scan their results.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.  Use a brief prompt to generate custom sites and pages with content hierarchy, design, and sample content that aligns with user needs. And all within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
OldVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.? Use a brief prompt to generate custom sites and pages with content hierarchy, design, and sample content that aligns with user needs. And all within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)
CurrentVersion.description: In the Tasks app and Microsoft Planner, which helps power the Tasks app in Teams, buckets are a common way to organize tasks into different areas of work. The mobile experience for the Tasks app in Teams will soon be updated to make it easier to filter to a specific bucket or set of buckets, so you can focus on tasks in your area. We expect this simple user experience change to provide greater focus and greater productivity, while maintaining the familiar look and feel throughout the Tasks app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)
OldVersion.description: In the Tasks app and Microsoft Planner, which helps power the Tasks app in Teams, buckets are a common way to organize tasks into different areas of work. The mobile experience for the Tasks app in Teams will soon be updated to make it easier to filter to a specific bucket or set of buckets, so you can focus on tasks in your area. We expect this simple user experience change to provide greater focus and greater productivity, while maintaining the familiar look and feel throughout the Tasks app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Task lists for each team member, recurring task lists, and top task publishing requests
CurrentVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Task lists for each team member, recurring task lists, and top task publishing requests
OldVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their organization’s structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their organization’s structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to set the availability by specific date in Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, we solely permit the frontline workers to establish daily recurring availability. With this new feature, we are enabling Frontline workers to set the availability for a specific date/time, in addition to recurring availability.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to set the availability by specific date in Shifts
OldVersion.description: Currently, we solely permit the frontline workers to establish daily recurring availability. With this new feature, we are enabling Frontline workers to set the availability for a specific date/time, in addition to recurring availability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance: Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance: Enhanced Policy Conditions
OldVersion.description: ,Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
OldVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
OldVersion.description: Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support joining a live event as an attendee for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Windows can now join a live event as an attendee and watch the streaming experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support joining a live event as an attendee for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Windows can now join a live event as an attendee and watch the streaming experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Redirect incoming call directly to voicemail from incoming call notification
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to easily redirect an incoming call to voicemail without having to accept or reject the call when receiving calls on a Teams certified phone device.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Redirect incoming call directly to voicemail from incoming call notification
OldVersion.description: Allows users to easily redirect an incoming call to voicemail without having to accept or reject the call when receiving calls on a Teams certified phone device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
CurrentVersion.description: ,Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
OldVersion.description: ,Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Domain-specific search
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to narrow down their search results and find what they are looking for faster. Get more precise search results by picking up a specific domain like files, group chat or Teams and channels. You can also search files or group chats by entering a person name.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Domain-specific search
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to
narrow down their search results and find what they are looking for faster. Get
more precise search results by picking up a specific domain like files, group
chat or Teams and channels. You can also search files or group chats by entering
a person name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting "Recording & Transcription" tab will be replaced by "Recap" tab
CurrentVersion.description: Now, the “Recap” tab for scheduled meetings will include access to the recording and transcript.  For meetings that have a “Recap” tab, the previous “Recording & Transcription” tab will be removed since the “Recap” tab will replace it. For meetings that don’t have a “Recap” tab, users can continue to access the recording and transcript from the “Recording & Transcription” tab.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting "Recording & Transcription" tab will be replaced by "Recap" tab
OldVersion.description: Now, the “Recap” tab for scheduled meetings will include access to the recording and transcript.  For meetings that have a “Recap” tab, the previous “Recording & Transcription” tab will be removed since the “Recap” tab will replace it. For meetings that don’t have a “Recap” tab, users can continue to access the recording and transcript from the “Recording & Transcription” tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): GA for enterprise secure AI controls in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description:
,Enterprise secure AI controls are now available in the Microsoft Edge management service. This feature provides a new dedicated space for admins to manage all AI-related policies in the Edge browser. This will help enhance security and productivity for managed users and devices.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-management-service#manage-enterprise-secure-ai-settings

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Controls for enterprise secure AI
OldVersion.description:
,
The Microsoft Edge management service will give admins the controls to manage settings for Enterprise AI features, including Copilot in Edge.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-management-service#manage-enterprise-secure-ai-settings

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Glint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Highlight top issues and potential solutions hidden throughout employee suggestions from survey results; plus, help leaders explore comments using natural-language questions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Glint
OldVersion.description:
,
Highlight top issues and potential solutions hidden throughout employee suggestions from survey results; plus, help leaders explore comments using natural-language questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
OldVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
CurrentVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
OldVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
OldVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
OldVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Calendar Items in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now filter your message list for conversations that have calendar invites when using the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Getting an overview of new meetings you're invited to and RSVP-ing to them directly in the message list becomes much easier with this new filter. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Calendar Items in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: You can now filter your message list for conversations that have calendar invites when using the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Getting an overview of new meetings you're invited to and RSVP-ing to them directly in the message list becomes much easier with this new filter.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams for Education: iOS/Android Parent link for School Connection
CurrentVersion.description: Allows parents to connect to School Connection in Teams for Education by clicking the iOS/Android mobile link provided by their school’s administration.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams for Education: iOS/Android Parent link for School Connection
OldVersion.description: Allows parents to connect to School Connection in Teams for Education by clicking the iOS/Android mobile link provided by their school’s administration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Import schedule improvements in Shifts app
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline managers importing a schedule from Excel into Shifts will be capable of viewing the import history of their teams. This allows them to monitor the status and outcome of their import at anytime.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Import schedule improvements in Shifts app
OldVersion.description: Frontline managers importing a schedule from Excel into Shifts will be capable of viewing the import history of their teams. This allows them to monitor the status and outcome of their import at anytime.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Aggregated Reactions Count in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We will be showing the count of Reactions aggregated across all items in the conversation in the Message List. This new feature will be available on Outlook on the web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Aggregated Reactions Count in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: We will be showing the count of Reactions aggregated across all items in the conversation in the Message List. This new feature will be available on Outlook on the web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Developers can now build Microsoft Teams apps with Outlook add-ins as extension element
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can now build and publish Teams apps with Outlook add-ins for use by their customers. Users can acquire these Teams apps with Outlook add-in for themselves via Outlook on the web, new Outlook for Windows, and classic Outlook for Windows clients. Admins can deploy to users from Integrated Apps in Microsoft 365 Admin Center. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Developers can now build Microsoft Teams apps with Outlook add-ins as extension element
OldVersion.description: Developers can now build and publish Teams apps with Outlook add-ins for use by their customers. Users can acquire these Teams apps with Outlook add-in for themselves via Outlook on the web, new Outlook for Windows, and classic Outlook for Windows clients. Admins can deploy to users from Integrated Apps in Microsoft 365 Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
CurrentVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
OldVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: In-product feedback button
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing an in-product feedback button to SharePoint, coherent with the rest of the M365 suite. This will provide the option to submit compliments, problems, or suggestions about UI/UX and feature functionality to Microsoft.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: In-product feedback button
OldVersion.description: We are introducing an in-product feedback button to SharePoint, coherent with the rest of the M365 suite. This will provide the option to submit compliments, problems, or suggestions about UI/UX and feature functionality to Microsoft.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Redesigned Message Bars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Infobars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows are redesigned to be more effective at conveying relevant information and communicating possible actions. They are also dismissible in the Compose form. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Redesigned Message Bars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Infobars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows are redesigned to be more effective at conveying relevant information and communicating possible actions. They are also dismissible in the Compose form.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Content source filters in Microsoft Search
CurrentVersion.description: Users can filter results by content source in the All vertical in Microsoft Search in microsoft365.com, SharePoint Home, and Bing @ Work. This feature will be available for all tenants with multiple sources configured in Microsoft Search (such as Power BI, Viva Learning, and third-party sources indexed via Microsoft Graph Connectors).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Content source filters in Microsoft Search
OldVersion.description: Users can filter results by content source in the All vertical in Microsoft Search in microsoft365.com, SharePoint Home, and Bing @ Work. This feature will be available for all tenants with multiple sources configured in Microsoft Search (such as Power BI, Viva Learning, and third-party sources indexed via Microsoft Graph Connectors).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Programmatic Desktop Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: With desktop sharing (made available OOB), meeting presenters can now screen-share all their meeting apps directly onto the stage for improved collaboration. We are introducing programmatic desktop sharing, which allows developers to enable screensharing specific pieces of app content. Unlike the currently existing share to stage functionality, meeting participants cannot interact with the shared app; they have a view-only mode of the presenter's app screen similar to screen sharing, but in one click. The shared content is also automatically captured in the meeting recording. This works great for co-consumption scenarios and requires little developer investment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Workspaces now supports adding highlighting
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge Workspaces users are now able to collaborate in a synchronized way by adding highlighting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updated submission results
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators and security operators will see updated results from submissions. These updates remove any confusion they might have with the current submission result.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
OldVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard for Watermark meeting (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Watermark enabled Microsoft Teams meetings will now support PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard to also be watermarked.

Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support joining a live event as an attendee for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Windows can now join a live event as an attendee and watch the streaming experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Redirect incoming call directly to voicemail from incoming call notification
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to easily redirect an incoming call to voicemail without having to accept or reject the call when receiving calls on a Teams certified phone device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
CurrentVersion.description: ,Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Domain-specific search
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to narrow down their search results and find what they are looking for faster. Get more precise search results by picking up a specific domain like files, group chat or Teams and channels. You can also search files or group chats by entering a person name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting "Recording & Transcription" tab will be replaced by "Recap" tab
CurrentVersion.description: Now, the “Recap” tab for scheduled meetings will include access to the recording and transcript.  For meetings that have a “Recap” tab, the previous “Recording & Transcription” tab will be removed since the “Recap” tab will replace it. For meetings that don’t have a “Recap” tab, users can continue to access the recording and transcript from the “Recording & Transcription” tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): GA for enterprise secure AI controls in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description:
,Enterprise secure AI controls are now available in the Microsoft Edge management service. This feature provides a new dedicated space for admins to manage all AI-related policies in the Edge browser. This will help enhance security and productivity for managed users and devices.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-management-service#manage-enterprise-secure-ai-settings

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Glint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Highlight top issues and potential solutions hidden throughout employee suggestions from survey results; plus, help leaders explore comments using natural-language questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
CurrentVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Calendar Items in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now filter your message list for conversations that have calendar invites when using the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Getting an overview of new meetings you're invited to and RSVP-ing to them directly in the message list becomes much easier with this new filter. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams for Education: iOS/Android Parent link for School Connection
CurrentVersion.description: Allows parents to connect to School Connection in Teams for Education by clicking the iOS/Android mobile link provided by their school’s administration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Import schedule improvements in Shifts app
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline managers importing a schedule from Excel into Shifts will be capable of viewing the import history of their teams. This allows them to monitor the status and outcome of their import at anytime.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Aggregated Reactions Count in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We will be showing the count of Reactions aggregated across all items in the conversation in the Message List. This new feature will be available on Outlook on the web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Developers can now build Microsoft Teams apps with Outlook add-ins as extension element
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can now build and publish Teams apps with Outlook add-ins for use by their customers. Users can acquire these Teams apps with Outlook add-in for themselves via Outlook on the web, new Outlook for Windows, and classic Outlook for Windows clients. Admins can deploy to users from Integrated Apps in Microsoft 365 Admin Center. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
CurrentVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: In-product feedback button
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing an in-product feedback button to SharePoint, coherent with the rest of the M365 suite. This will provide the option to submit compliments, problems, or suggestions about UI/UX and feature functionality to Microsoft.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Redesigned Message Bars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Infobars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows are redesigned to be more effective at conveying relevant information and communicating possible actions. They are also dismissible in the Compose form. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Content source filters in Microsoft Search
CurrentVersion.description: Users can filter results by content source in the All vertical in Microsoft Search in microsoft365.com, SharePoint Home, and Bing @ Work. This feature will be available for all tenants with multiple sources configured in Microsoft Search (such as Power BI, Viva Learning, and third-party sources indexed via Microsoft Graph Connectors).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Programmatic Desktop Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: With desktop sharing (made available OOB), meeting presenters can now screen-share all their meeting apps directly onto the stage for improved collaboration. We are introducing programmatic desktop sharing, which allows developers to enable screensharing specific pieces of app content. Unlike the currently existing share to stage functionality, meeting participants cannot interact with the shared app; they have a view-only mode of the presenter's app screen similar to screen sharing, but in one click. The shared content is also automatically captured in the meeting recording. This works great for co-consumption scenarios and requires little developer investment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Workspaces now supports adding highlighting
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge Workspaces users are now able to collaborate in a synchronized way by adding highlighting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updated submission results
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators and security operators will see updated results from submissions. These updates remove any confusion they might have with the current submission result.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.
